mapper.insert: insert into Member ( m_id, m_pw, m_name, m_birth, m_email, m_phone, m_addr1, m_addr2, m_addr3) values( #{m_id}, #{m_pw}, #{m_name}, #{m_birth}, #{m_email}, #{m_phone}, #{m_addr1}, #{m_addr2}, #{m_addr3} )
mapper.select: select * from member where m_id=#{m_id} and m_pw=#{m_pw}
select count(*) from member where m_id=#{m_id}
